review: I have used two of these before. One was at a friends and it worked great on his but when I bought one I thought it was my internet. I kept getting a network error so I had assumed it was my internet and I held onto it for awhile. When I finally got the chance to test it out at his place where I know his works, mine gave the same network error and continued to disconnect and reconnect. Sadly by this time any return was out of the option and according to this I can't order another unless it's refurbished currently?  I had tried to find a solution in the forums but there doesn't seem to be any and as I mentioned above, I can't use any warranty or returns at this point. I guess the point is if you have a network error and the box keeps disconnecting and reconnecting, don't assume it's your router and wait to test it elsewhere. Sadly this will be a cost out of my pocket for something that didn't work the day I got it. Hopefully they offer it again so I can buy another someday.
